ygData.messageBody:

Regular heals work Great on Mage pets. My mage always groups with a cleric
friend if grouped at all. The pets already have huge regen...i just wish my
necro had a choice with 2 or more pets to summon...a Fire Skellie-glows red
and hands are on fire...A Lich skellie-dark skellie that does a small life
tap live vampiric embrace :) hehe wouldnt that be sweet
Arkania
